# isTransient

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is transient.

## Declaration

```swift
var isTransient: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is transient, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. The transient flag specifies whether or not a property’s value is ignored when an object is saved to a persistent store. Transient properties are not saved to the persistent store, but are still managed for undo, redo, validation, and so on.

### Special Considerations

Setting this property raises an exception if the receiver’s model has been used by an object graph manager.

## Accessing Features of a Property

- **entity**: The entity description of the receiver.
- **isIndexed**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver should be indexed for searching.
- **isOptional**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is optional.
- **name**: The name of the receiver.
- **userInfo**: The user info dictionary of the receiver.
